dezmin.name: Dezmin
dezmin.title: Grandmaster of the Imperial Knights
dezmin.description: The Grandmaster of the Imperial Knights, walking the line between light and dark through discipline.
dezmin.philosophy: Balance through discipline. Power through restraint.
dezmin.emphasis: Order, balance, disciplined Force use, imperial justice
dezmin.voiceStyle: Measured, authoritative, introspective. Speaks in deliberate, controlled language.
dezmin.tooltip: Dezmin reflects your character through disciplined balance and Imperial duty

levelGreetings.1: You have been chosen to join the Imperial Knights. We serve the Emperor, not through fear, but through honor.
levelGreetings.2: Your training progresses well. Remember, we are not Jedi. We seek order and justice through the Force.
levelGreetings.3: Balance is the key to our Order. Channel the Force without passion or detachment.
levelGreetings.4: Your mastery of both combat and the Force grows stronger. You serve the Empire well.
levelGreetings.5: You have reached the midpoint of your training. The gray path demands constant vigilance.
levelGreetings.6: Your dedication honors the Imperial Knights. Few can walk the balanced path as you do.
levelGreetings.7: The Force serves you, not the other way around.
levelGreetings.8: You are becoming a true guardian of the Empire.
levelGreetings.9: Nearly complete. Soon you will stand as a full Imperial Knight.
levelGreetings.10: You have mastered the way of the Imperial Knight. Serve the Empire with honor, balance, and strength.

imperialnight_guardian.greeting: Guardian of the Empire. You defend order with discipline and resolve.
imperialnight_guardian.confirmation: Balance offense and defense, and uphold Imperial principles.

imperialnight_striker.greeting: Striker. You bring order through decisive action.
imperialnight_striker.confirmation: Strike with precision and controlled fury.

imperialnight_sentinel.greeting: Sentinel. You operate between order and shadow.
imperialnight_sentinel.confirmation: Move with patience, discretion, and vigilance.

imperialnight_disciple.greeting: Disciple. You build strength through discipline.

imperialnight_enforcer.greeting: Enforcer. You uphold Imperial law and obedience.
imperialnight_enforcer.confirmation: Project authority through presence and action.

imperialnight_scholar.greeting: Scholar of the Force and Imperial philosophy.
imperialnight_scholar.confirmation: Knowledge and discernment amplify your effectiveness.

guidance.class: Choose the path that serves the Empire and preserves your balance.
guidance.talents: Each talent must serve discipline and combat efficacy.
guidance.abilities: A balanced Knight strengthens both body and mind.
guidance.skills: Skill and knowledge are instruments of Imperial stability.
guidance.multiclass: Ensure all paths reinforce discipline and duty.
guidance.forcePowers: The Force is a tool. Choose powers that reinforce control and authority.
guidance.hp: A Knight must endure to serve.
guidance.summary: Balance is not neutrality — it is discipline in action.

tier1: Freedom isn’t given. It’s discovered—usually when everything else is taken.
tier2: I found purpose in a place meant for beasts and ghosts.
tier3: The Force awakened when I accepted discipline instead of anger.
tier4: Both Jedi and Sith mistake certainty for truth.
tier5: In breaking my blade, I freed what was bound within. That choice defined me.

dspBlocked: Come back when you’re willing to question yourself.
